item.title: The House Hot Sheet for Week 2 of the 2024 Legislative Session – Washington State House Democrats
item.description: News article "The House Hot Sheet for Week 2 of the 2024 Legislative Session – Washington State House Democrats" from House Democrats.

item.title: 👍Jane Beyer - Office of the Insurance Commissioner
item.description: Jane Beyer signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Office of the Insurance Commissioner.

item.title: 👎Alex Town - samaritan healthcare
item.description: Alex Town signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent samaritan healthcare.

item.title: 👎Bill Robertson - MultiCare Health System
item.description: Bill Robertson signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent MultiCare Health System.

item.title: 👎💵Chelene Whiteaker - Washington State Hospital Association
item.description: Chelene Whiteaker signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington State Hospital Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎Doug Ross - Washington State Hospital Association
item.description: Doug Ross signed up to testify Con.

item.title: 👎Ettore Palazzo - Evergreenhealth
item.description: Ettore Palazzo signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Evergreenhealth.

item.title: 👍Chris Bandoli - NABIP WA
item.description: Chris Bandoli signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent NABIP WA.

item.title: 👍💵Gary Strannigan - Premera
item.description: Gary Strannigan signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Premera. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍💵Jennifer Muhm - Regence BlueShield
item.description: Jennifer Muhm signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Regence BlueShield. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍💵Jennifer Ziegler - Association of Washington Health Care Plans
item.description: Jennifer Ziegler signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Association of Washington Health Care Plans. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎💵Sean Graham - Washington State Medical Assocation (WSMA)
item.description: Sean Graham signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington State Medical Assocation (WSMA). They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍💵Emily Brice - Northwest Health Law Advocates
item.description: Emily Brice signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Northwest Health Law Advocates. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Jim Freeburg - Patient Coalition of Washington
item.description: Jim Freeburg signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Patient Coalition of Washington.

item.title: 👍Bill Kramer - Purchaser Business Group on Health
item.description: Bill Kramer signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Purchaser Business Group on Health.

item.title: ❓💵Lori Grassi - WA State Chiropractic Association
item.description: Lori Grassi signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent WA State Chiropractic Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Evan Klein - Health Care Authority (HCA) - Special Assistant, Legislative & Policy Affairs
item.description: Evan Klein signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Health Care Authority (HCA) - Special Assistant, Legislative & Policy Affairs.

item.description: JD, Leah Hole-Marshall signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent WA Health Benefit Exchange, General Counsel and Chief Strategist.

item.description: Sybill Hyppolite signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent WA State Labor Council. They are a registered lobbyist.
